title: 175 How to Practice and Understand Faith and Spirituality with Rob Bell
description:
"Spirituality is awareness that life is a gift and how you respond matters." - Rob Bell
If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, video interview, and more at lewishowes.com/175.
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
